ooassignment3.gui

Class AccessoryView

  • java.lang.Object
    • javafx.application.Application
      • ooassignment3.gui.AccessoryView

  • public class AccessoryView
extends javafx.application.Application
    This class constructs the GUI that allows the user to make choices on a chosen car. Providing feedback on how their choice effects price and MPG.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class javafx.application.Application

        javafx.application.Application.Parameters

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class javafx.application.Application

        STYLESHEET_CASPIAN, STYLESHEET_MODENA

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      AccessoryView(java.lang.String carUrl, VehicleEnum chosenVehicle)
      This constructor creates the GUI, and from the parameters sets the variables that describe details of the car chosen from the previous GUI view

    • Constructor Detail

      • AccessoryView

        public AccessoryView(java.lang.String carUrl,
                     VehicleEnum chosenVehicle)
        This constructor creates the GUI, and from the parameters sets the variables that describe details of the car chosen from the previous GUI view
        Parameters:
        carUrl - The local file location of the chosen car's image file. Should the image not be found a label will takes its place.
        chosenVehicle - The chosen car.

        public void reset()

      • createAccessoryRemoveHbox

        public javafx.scene.layout.HBox createAccessoryRemoveHbox(AccessoryEnum accessoryEnum)
        Creates an accessory label with an adjacent remove button. These are held in a horizontal box. The remove button allows the user to change their mind by removing a previously chosen accessory.
        Parameters:
        accessoryEnum - The type of accessory the user has added
        Returns:
        The horizontal box containing the label and paired remove button.
